data.title: Shakes
data.text: I picked up two shakes, due to sickness n not being able to eat.  I figured having a shake once a day for couple days will be fine.  First time I ever ordered two to go. One for today n one for to morrow. The day one shake was good.  But, noticed something surreal with day two shake. Not pure ice cream at all and tasted sick.  I since then stopped drinking shakes. Not real ice cream.

data.title: How hard is it to get an order right?!?!?
data.text:
I have NEVER ordered an unsweet iced tea and actually been served an unsweet iced tea from this location! 

When they give me my drink I ask "unsweet tea?" and get "yes" and I do not pull away from the window without checking my drink. It's always wrong! 

And one time I told the girl it was sweet tea and I had ordered unsweet tea and when I got my new drink it was STILL UNSWEET TEA! 

I will NEVER be going back to this location ever again!

data.title: I love Wendy's
data.text: I'm glad this is not on my daily "glide path" or I'd eat here often and gain a ton of weight as a result. I love the Wendy's Baconator and the Chili with cheese. Full size Chocolate Frosty is good if I eat light but too much otherwise.  Service here is good.  Music piped in over the speakers is excellent (to my tastes). Drive through can get long lines and the cash register line inside doesn't move very fast but the staff are friendly here.

data.title: WNEDY'S
data.text: good food, good quantity for price. location is always good. good friends also make dining a pleasure

data.title: Drive thru and food were great!
data.text: I hadn't been to this restaurant in a while. I utilized the drive thru and the cashier was very helpful. She answered menu questions cheerfully and I got chili, baconator fries and a full salad. The salad was amazing and so was the chili! The fries weren't as good as we'd hoped. All in all we liked the experience and would return.

data.title: One of my favorite Wendy's
data.text: This particular location has consistently had fairly fast drive-thru service. I've had one mess up on an order in the past year which in my book is pretty good for a fast food joint.

data.title: Big Mark says: 'find another Wendy's if you can'
data.text: I'm not a regular forger for fast food, but if I were, I wouldn't come to this Wendy' on Saxon Ave in Deltona.  Don't get me wrong,  I like Wendy's food chain establishments.  Trouble is, this one has always been a disappointment.  To give you an instance of disenchantment: their small order of chili.  I enjoy Wendy's chili, but this one is chintzy on what they put in the cup.  Every other Wendy's that I've visited FILLS the cup.  Saxon avenue fills it three quarters full. The first time I asked them to please fill the cup.  The manager said it was the proper portion according to the Wendy's guidelines. I sighed took it and drove off.  Next closest is in Orange City, where they fill the cup.  Downtown Orlando on the Orange Blossom trail, they fill the cup, and every other one they fill the cup.  It is tasty, but the lack of meat in the sauce as well at the Saxon avenue establishment should be rendered as Mexican Tomato soup with bean(s)!.  Over the years I've visited them (I live here in Deltona, so I guess I'm a glutton for punishment)  it still is there 'policy'. In addition, I like fresh French fries paired with a repast of some sort of beef on my bun.  I've had to ask them for fresh French fries because the ones served with my bacon burger (which was luke-warm) were limp.  A tip, ask for French fries fried with no salt, if you've got the time, and they have to make them fresh, then just before you leave the drive thru, ask for salt packages. As I said in the beginning of this rant, or shall I say review, Wendy's as a chain is ok, but from this one... stay away!  (It's not the workers, it's the management) ,

data.title: Wendy's Chili
data.text: “Wendy’s” is similar to the other fast food restaurants one finds in the USA.  But, I firmly believe that their “Chili” is fantastic.

data.title: Fast food bummer
data.text: Cold food once again. I guess I won't be coming back to this location. My chili was nothing but water, out of potatoes, and frosty was melted

data.title: quick and tasty
data.text: As with all the Wendy's I visited, there is good food and friendly service.  This one is no exception.  Dine in or drive through, the service is great and the employees go the extra step to make sure you are satisfied.
